d:chapter.d:title: Alternative spellings <iso646.h>
d:chapter.d:para: The header <iso646.h> defines the following eleven macros (on the left) that expand to the corresponding tokens (on the right):
d:chapter.d:programlisting: and && and_eq &= bitand & bitor | compl ~ not ! not_eq != or || or_eq |= xor ^ xor_eq ^=
